transcript:
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ek kaam karte hain, ek kaam karte hain, ye bahut pareshan kar raha hai. Maine aapko na video meeting link pata nahi dekho aapke paas aayi hai kya?
Customer: Haan, mail aaya hai.
Executive: Mail aaya hai na? To usko aap join kar lo sir. Isse hum log pareshan ho jayenge. Meri to baat hi nahi kabhi puri ho payegi aapse.
Customer: Haan wahi to sahi pareshan hone wali hai.
Executive: Haan kariye join to aapko aadhe ghante ke andar sara sahi kar dunga aapko bata dunga sara na. Proper tarike se wahi chahiye.
Executive: Main pura proper bataunga. Isme ab main dikha bhi to paunga aapko. Abhi to call pe baat ho rahi hai. Abhi to dikha bhi paunga na video meet mein aapko.
Customer: Ek minute mein system mein aa jata hu.
Executive: Kariye kariye haan kariye.


Customer: Google meet se karna padega?
Executive: Haan sir, Google meet se kariye join aap.
Customer: Achcha achcha. 
Executive: Main bhi kar hi raha hu join.
Executive: Aur ab to main aapko whatsapp call bhi kar sakta hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aapko whatsapp call hi karta hu sir. Isme na fir kat jayegi call kya hi matlab hai.
Customer: Haan haan whatsapp mein kar dijiye. Haan haan kar dijiye. Mere dusre bhi call aayenge to unko busy nahi dikhega.
Executive: Sahi hai, sahi hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues and needs assistance.

- Executive suggests joining a video meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to resolve the issue via video meet.

- Executive decided to connect via WhatsApp call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, whatsapp call, resolution
